name: SlideUp!
description:
SlideUP! is a puzzle game where you have to slide up all the green blocks. Each level offers you a different and hard enigma to solve. Your major challenge is to find a way to free the green blocks and finally slide them up.

-----------------------

Features of SlideUp!

  • Challenging enigmas to solve
  • A puzzle game to think
  • A flat style and minimal sounds
  • 207 levels to solve / 72 levels to solve
  • Different types of blocks to play with
  • Levels more and more hard to beat
  • Hints to help you in case you're stuck

-----------------------

Advantages of paid version

  • 135 new levels to play
  • No ads between levels
  • More initial hints
  • Hints are easier to get

-----------------------
